content: crochet your very own gothic guardian with this gargoyle amigurumi pattern inspired by the legendary stone protectors of castles and cathedrals this project combines spooky charm with handmade cuteness perfect for halloween décor fantasy fans or anyone who loves unique amigurumi designs pattern details * step-by-step instructions * intermediate-friendly basic amigurumi knowledge recommended * finished plush makes a great gift or gothic décor piece * includes instructions for diy plushie in 3 different sizes perfect for * halloween decorations * gothic decor and fantasy lovers * mythical creature collections * handmade halloween gift for something a little unusual bring your own gargoyle to life stitch by stitch because even stone guardians can be cute when crocheted
